1.name: The Exorcist
1.description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

2.name: American Graffiti
2.description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

3.name: Papillon
3.description: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

4.name: Enter the Dragon
4.description: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

5.name: The Holy Mountain
5.description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

6.name: Live and Let Die
6.description: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

7.name: Soylent Green
7.description: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

8.name: Robin Hood
8.description: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

9.name: Mean Streets
9.description: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob.

10.name: The Sting
10.description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

11.name: Serpico
11.description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

12.name: The Wicker Man
12.description: A Police Sergeant is sent to a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the townsfolk claim never existed. Stranger still are the rites that take place there.

13.name: Walking Tall
13.description: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

14.name: Westworld
14.description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

15.name: Magnum Force
15.description: Dirty Harry is on the trail of vigilante cops who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

16.name: Don't Look Now
16.description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

17.name: High Plains Drifter
17.description: A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

18.name: Badlands
18.description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

19.name: The Long Goodbye
19.description: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam then gets implicated in his wife's murder.

20.name: Jesus Christ Superstar
20.description: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

21.name: Lady Snowblood
21.description: A young girl is born and raised to be an instrument of revenge.

22.name: Paper Moon
22.description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

23.name: The Last Detail
23.description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

24.name: Coffy
24.description: A black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

25.name: The Train Robbers
25.description: A gunhand named Lane is hired by a widow, Mrs. Lowe, to find gold stolen by her husband so that she may return it and start fresh.

26.name: The Day of the Jackal
26.description: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

27.name: The Way We Were
27.description: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

28.name: My Name Is Nobody
28.description: A young, easygoing gunman (Hill) worships and competes with an old gunfighter (Fonda) who only wants to retire.

29.name: Immoral Tales
29.description: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

30.name: The Three Musketeers
30.description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

31.name: Amarcord
31.description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

32.name: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
32.description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

33.name: The Legend of Hell House
33.description: Physicist Lionel Barrett and his wife lead a team of mediums into the Belasco House, which is supposedly haunted by the victims of its late owner, a six-foot-five serial killer.

34.name: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
34.description: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

35.name: The Vault of Horror
35.description: An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.

36.name: Charlotte's Web
36.description: A gentle and wise grey spider with a flair for promotion pledges to save a young pig from slaughter for dinner food.

37.name: Thriller: A Cruel Picture
37.description: A young woman, muted after a sexual assault as a child, is trained to seek violent revenge on those who have wronged her after being kidnapped and forced to work as a prostitute.

38.name: La Grande Bouffe
38.description: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

39.name: Godspell
39.description: An adaption of the musical, in a modern-day song-and-dance recreation of the Gospel of St. Matthew.

40.name: Torso
40.description: A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.

41.name: That'll Be the Day
41.description: Abandoned by his father at an early age, Jim MacLaine seems to have inherited the old man's restlessness. Despite his apparent intelligence, Jim decides not to take the exams that would ...                See full summary »

42.name: Fantastic Planet
42.description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

43.name: Day for Night
43.description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

44.name: Scarecrow
44.description: Max, an ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by Lion, a homeless ex-sailor, and they partner up as they head east together.

45.name: O Lucky Man!
45.description: An apprentice coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.

46.name: Kanashimi no beradonna
46.description: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.

47.name: Dillinger
47.description: John Dillinger and his gang go on a bank robbing spree across the midwest, but one G-Man is determined to bring him down.

48.name: Invasion of the Bee Girls
48.description: A powerful cosmic force is turning Earth women into queen bees who kill men by wearing them out sexually.

49.name: Malicious
49.description: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated by their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.

50.name: Anita: Swedish Nymphet
50.description: Anita is a girl of only teenage years, and while she has developed early physically, to a mature woman, she is emotionally struggling. Her relationship the her parents and her friends is ...                See full summary »
